titles.title: Stop Exploiting Children Act
To prohibit the provision of foreign assistance to border countries that are not taking adequate measures to stop child pornography from entering the United States.
Stop Exploiting Children Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Stop Exploiting Children Act
This bill prohibits the President from providing foreign assistance to a country that shares a border with the United States if that country is not taking adequate measures to stop child pornography from entering the United States.
